categories: Category:Star Wars: Agent of the Empire trade paperbacks

nodes.text: Star Wars: Agent of the Empire Volume 2—Hard Targets

Star Wars: Agent of the Empire Volume 2—Hard Targets is a Star Wars Legends trade paperback that collects the five-part comic-book series Star Wars: Agent of the Empire—Hard Targets from author John Ostrander. It was published by Dark Horse Books on August 6, 2013.

When the current Count Dooku is assassinated—and Boba Fett is framed for the deed—the Count's young heir becomes a political pawn. Agent Cross has his orders, but when the boy's fate is left to a murderous uncle, an angry bounty hunter, and two lethal ladies, Cross changes his mission!
